channel.title: Machine Learning on Jameson Thai
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Jameson Thai

item.title: Pommerman
item.description: Based off the classic game Bomberman, my team of 8 people tackle how agents acomplish tasks with infinitely meaningful variations through competitive multi-agent learning. Our team was split betwen two teams; Pytorch and TensorForce, with the goal of seeing if different frameworks lead to different results but trying the same algorithms being PPO and A2C. We leverage pre-existing architecture and code from Pommerman Competition as cited below. Pommerman Competition

item.title: Data Science Intern
item.description: This was a 10 week internship from June 2019 - August 2019 What was achieved Developed Python image identification model for identifying any DC Universe characters in a given DC Universe comic page achieving 76% accuracy. Presented project architecture and model’s layer activation to WB executive, data intelligence team, and DCU stakeholders. Deployed Python web crawler that collects and parses DC comic images of any DC Universe Character.
